translations.translation: How terrible were My punishment and warnings!
How was then My punishment of which they had been warned?
So how awesome were My chastisement and My warnings!
How terrible was My punishment and warning.
So how did My punishment turn out, and My warnings?
Then, how was My torment and My warnings
How (great) was then My punishment and My warning!
How then were My chastisement and My warnings?
Then see how (dreadful) was My punishment after My warnings!
How [terrible] were My punishment and My warnings!
So how dreadful have been My torment and My warnings.
So how were My punishment and My warnings?!
Ah! how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning!
Then, how (terrible) was My Torment and My Warnings?
How then were My punishment and My warnings!
So how were My punishment and My warnings?
And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
[54:30] How then were My chastisement and My warnings?, My warning them of chastisement before it was sent down? In other words, it was justified. He explains it [their chastisement] by saying:
(Then see) Muhammad (how (dreadful) was My punishment after My warnings!) and how was the state of those warned by Salih but who rejected faith

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ولم يبال بالقسمة الإلهية { فَكَيْفَ كَانَ } يعني: انظر كيف وقع { عَذَابِي } عليهم { وَ } لحق { نُذُرِ } [القمر: 30] أياهم
 بعدما عقروا الناقة
